thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 4 of 116
thread.title: Keisha Simmons

author: Keisha Simmons
title: Keisha Simmons
text: I love ezCater, I have used this site 11 times this year and it definitely does not disappoint. Having a service that makes finding catering is wonderful, it has allowed me the ability to find and use different catering I would not know about. the best part about ezCater is that they take a lot of the worry about ordering from caters out, because they confirm and track your order for you. I love ezCater and will continue to use the site for all all of my order food orders.
